analysis.Summary: A lightweight Vue 3 single-file component that renders a checkmark SVG icon with a configurable fill color.
analysis.Purpose: To provide a reusable, themable checkmark icon in the navigation/icons module of the project.

Components.name: IconCheckmark
Components.responsibility: Renders an SVG checkmark and accepts a `fill` prop to control its color.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.purpose: Declares and types the component props in the `<script setup>` block.

fill.description: CSS color value for the SVG path fill.

analysis.Usage:
Import the component where a checkmark icon is needed, for example:

```js
import IconCheckmark from 'modules/icons/navigation/IconCheckmark.vue'
``` 

And in the template:
```html
<IconCheckmark fill="rgb(255,0,0)" />
```
analysis.Notes: No `<style>` block is present; styling is driven entirely via props and inherited CSS variables. There are no accessibility attributes (e.g., `role` or `aria-hidden`), so you may want to add them if this icon is used in interactive UI contexts.
